Content: There should be different kind of clone societies. The difference
would be the homogeneity. Some clone societies may all be identical
copies of one individual others may have castes optimized for certain
tasks. There may also be clone societies that are based on templates
and vary over them or just generate the DNA for every individual semi

randomly.
The level of homogeneity should influence the
susceptibility to bio weapons and the bonuses from specialized labor,
or the susceptibility to racist rhetoric or tolerance of communism or
